column1: Mr. Mackey, there's something you should know...
Isn't it awesome havin' a great wall around our city? Nobody in town except for our good friends.
Go on, kids! Go! Go and don't look back!
We are your parents. You used to live here, with us.
You mean how he said we should trust each other, or how he abducted children?
Just look at those boys out there, lovin' the great game of baseball like we did when we were kids.
Yeah, our boys really stuck it to 'em!
You could do it, kids! We know you can win State!
